title: Jealousy, Infatuation, Heartbreak! Loves of Three Queens (1954) Hedy Lamarr | Full Movie, Subtitles

sources.title: Jealousy, Infatuation, Heartbreak! Loves of Three Queens (1954) Hedy Lamarr | Full Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
Actress Leala (Hedy Lamarr) plays multiple roles of Historic Queens.  Including Helen of Troy, Napoleon's Empress Josephine, and German folk heroine Lady Genevieve. But actress Leala doesn't feel that any of them fully suit her personality. The film is about the essence of women. The picture has an interesting combination of directors--France's Marc Allegret and US Edgar Ulmer and features a musical score by Nino Rota.

Original title: L'amante di Paride (1954) AKA: The Fate of Two Queens

Director: Edgar G. Ulmer
